SCControl API

1.0

Spacecraft Control Library

This application programming interface (API) document contains documentation for functions in SCControl framework. There are modules for coordinate transformation, modeling the space environment, computing ephemeris, and performing orbit mechanics including planetary perturbations. This library utilizes the broad range of matrix manipulation functions provided in MatrixLib.

The formation flying module, if included, is a comprehensive set of functions for the guidance and control of formation flying spacecraft.

Using this API

File List

All the functions are grouped here.

Class List

The major classes and structures are described here.

Support

If you find a bug, please send a full description to support@psatellite.com, along with the source code you were using when you found the problem, and a summary of what the source code is supposed to do. One of our software engineers will respond to confirm receipt of your email, and then investigate the problem.

permission in writing from Princeton Satellite Systems.
